{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cubietech |model=Cubietruck |revision=v1.0 (0606) |asin=B00KG33E7M |newegg=9SIA7BF37Z1969 |est_release_date=10/2013 |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=A20 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=SK hynix |fla1_model=H27UCG8T2ATR |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ4G83AFR |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA, Micro SD card slot, |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, |wi1_module=AMPAK AP6210 |wi1_module_if=SDIO (module) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43362 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM20710 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=integrated |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8211E |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP209;;1; ,,, Bluetooth 4.0 Chip;Broadcom;BCM20710;;1; |flags=Bluetooth 4.0, HDMI 1.4, VGA, SPDIF, IrDA,
Audio out (3.5 mm), RTC w/ battery backup, |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=Android, Debian, Armbian, Arch Linux (Arm), |802dot11_protocols=bgn |oui=6C:FA:A7 |oui_eth=02:17:05 }} {{TagLine|Development Board}} :[http://www.cubietech.com/product-detail/cubieboard3/ Product Page] *[http://docs.cubieboard.org/tutorials/cubietruck/start ''Cubietruck'' on '''Wiki'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Cubietruck ''Cubietruck'' on '''SunXi'''] *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cubieboard#Cubietruck_.28Cubieboard3.29 ''Cubieboard'' on '''Wikipedia'''] ===See also=== *[[Cubietech Cubietruck]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard]] - ''Allwinner'' A10 1-cores ARM Cortex-A8 @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 2]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 3]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.0GHz :Wi-Fi: [[Broadcom]] BCM4329, BT: [[Broadcom]] BCM40181, [[Realtek]] RTL8211E *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 4]] - ''Allwinner'' A80 SoC (4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 :4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 big.LITTLE), GPU: PowerVR G6230, (2.4/5GHz) *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 5]] - ''Allwinner'' H8 8-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @2.0GHz :GPU: PowerVR SGX544 @700MHz, Toshiba TC358777XBG, (2.4/5GHz)
